title: Mr. Rossi goes camping
creator_credit: Bruno Bozzetto Films and Bruno Bozzetto
brief_description: Mr Rossi’s search for a peaceful camping site leads him into hilarious encounters with bulldozers, cows and mountain-climbing motorcycles. Though not a “message” film, along with the laughter the real ecological problems come through. An animated film.
